title: Bug 107816If I enter "Currency" as a Format Code of Number, it can't be applied properly.
description: Description: If I enter "Currency" as a Format Code of Number, it can't beapplied properly.Steps:1. It is displayedas "Currency1234.56".
OB: Apply it to a data.Actual result: it isn't displayed as "$1,234.56".
SR: Bug 107816If I enter "Currency" as a Format Code of Number, it can't be applied properly. Create a new style of format number.2. Enter "Currency" as format code.3.
